website_summaries.verdict: The Adidas Icon V Turf baseball cleat’s sneaker-like look has been a hit for Adidas patrons. This turf baseball shoe also proves itself to be more than skin-deep as its comfort, traction, and fit checks out. The price does not leave the wallet bruised as well. Overall, if you’re a sneakerhead looking for baseball cleat, this one is one to consider.
pros: The Adidas Icon V is comfortable to wear according to the majority of its reviewers
A significant number of comments are impressed by the excellent traction of this turf baseball cleat
The overall look of this Adidas Icon baseball shoe has been appreciated by a handful of shoppers
A couple of wearers say that this baseball cleat’s fit is great
Another wearer indicates that this Adidas’ cleats lockdown is good
The support delivered by this Adidas baseball cleat especially in the ankle area is praise-worthy according to a wearer
cons: Majority of the complaints from users are about how challenging this pair is to put on

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing size 9 for many years reliably across all brands of shoes so I ordered my normal size 9. I was very reluctant to buy these based on all the comments about not being able to put them on. The opening does not have as much room or flexibility as typical shoes with a tongue. I had a shoehorn in my closet unused for about 20 years. It came in handy for putting these on. Using a shoehorn, these shoes slid right on and fit great! It's almost like wearing another pair of socks. I wear them for softball. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on foot
customer_reviews.text: This glove for foot style fit was terrible. I would go crazy if I had to try to put these on often. Also feel the lacing pattern made it difficult to tighten up laces the one time I finally got the shoe on my foot. Felt difficult to loosen and untie. Returned the shoes
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Fair but too narrow and tough to put on
customer_reviews.text: Narrow. I buy all shoes off shelf. Don’t need a wife ever but these are narrow. Tough to put on also. The top opening is small. Once in they are ok. Don’t breath well but look good and as a coach I don’t need a lot of performance so not sure how good they grip and such
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for an athlete
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these turf shoes. He loved the navy pair so much I bought a second pair in black. He wears them every day to work out and they are wearing well. He says they are very comfortable and have great support. Great product for great price. Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mommy of 2

customer_reviews.title: Not very wide
customer_reviews.text: These looked comfortable but they were way to narrow for my feet returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN E HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Swag
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new shoes, can’t wait to try them on for her 1st softball 🥎 game!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: light weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Getting them on is a real pain but once they are on everything is good. I am not fan of the lacing system on the shoe, but I would have no idea how to improve it. Overall I really love them even on wet grass i had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: TMas

customer_reviews.title: I just had problems putting them on
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were really good looking shoes. I just had problems getting them on. I am an older person and that was a problem. I could not put them on. Thank You. For your prompt service
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Murray

customer_reviews.title: The foot does not enter, be careful so that you do not have to unwind it as and
customer_reviews.text: Too bad, the laces or ties they have are just fancy. The foot does not enter because the coldones do not work and the elastic that it has to open the hole where the foot goes does not extend. The structure is very poorly done.
customer_reviews.author: Yeimi Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Loved shoe and fit so much considering getting the cleats for this years season
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on
customer_reviews.text: really hard to get the shoes on, but feels nice once it is on
customer_reviews.author: Spicebert

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is hard to get on at first. But overall a good shoe for Softball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a little small & slippery
customer_reviews.text: slippery on the turf we play on, shoe was hard to get on, a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: A L Sundberg

customer_reviews.title: For a older baseball player EE size  is very important
customer_reviews.text: Like sole good color to small, hard get on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffith

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Icon V Turf Sneaker
feature_bullets: The Adidas brand has a long history and deep-rooted Connection with sport. Everything we do is rooted in sport

Driven by a relentless pursuit of innovation as well as decades of accumulating sports science expertise, we cater for all, from elite professional athletes and teams to any individual who wants to able sport part of their lives
